content:
As you spend more time with the spirit of the archivist, you find yourself wondering more and more about the nature of existence. How is this spirit visible to you? Is it something about the arcology that makes it possible? When you die, is there a possibility that you too will be tethered to the physcial plane? It's almost too much to contemplate.

RANGERS CHOOSE

A) Continue to lead the spirit. Discard all   from the Archivist Spirit. Travel to the Cage and clear the Archivist Spirit with   while the Heart is in play to learn more about it.

B) Let the spirit go on its way. Discard the Archivist Spirit. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
